oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Obtaining synchronization for a class of chaotic systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SHARMA, N
POONACHA, PG
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: vector-fields
time-series
reconstruction
communication
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An iterative algorithm is proposed for constructing synchronizing receivers for a chosen class of chaotic transmitter systems. A complete knowledge of the transmitter system is not required. Identical synchronization is ensured with the transmitted signal in the constructed receivers. Potential applications of the method are discussed for communications.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: WORLD SCIENTIFIC PUBL CO PTE LTD
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: INTERNATIONAL JOURNAL OF BIFURCATION AND CHAOS, 7(11), 2587-2592
